text.text_translated:
The Scallion is a newspaper.
It comes out every week.
It is free in university buildings.
About 10,000 students read it.
Students write and make this newspaper.
A study shows students and university workers like this newspaper a lot.
They say it is good for fun.
It helps them learn new things about culture.
It is also good for work experience.
However, even though people like it, the newspaper has some problems.
For example, printing the newspaper costs a lot of money.
Also, some students cannot get the newspaper easily.
This is because they must go to the university to get it.
Another problem is that many copies become trash in the university area.
This is bad for the environment.
